name: MIND TRAP (itch)
description:
In this "platformer," you imagine your own platforms. Build your way through a dream as you lead other brains to safety. Zap evil brains with your mental energy — the same stuff you use to build platforms. You can take the straight-forward route or find your own. Now, go save those brains!

CONTROLS

  • WASD or Arrow Keys & Spacebar
  • Mouse movement and clicking

MY SITES / CONTACT

  • Discord
  • Itch
  • Website
  • Game Jolt

PIZZA JAM

This game was made within 48 hours for Pizza Jam 3.
